name: Afterwords
description:
In the late 1600's, the West Indies lived  under the tyranny of the Midnight Beggar. Captained by The Great Corrozo, The Midnight Beggar was a formidable pirate frigate inhabited by a Lich crew. 

You are a valued member of this crew, a Lich with a magical gift, allowing you to learn the history of any object you touch. After the latest raid, you've three new recruits, resurrected from the aftermath. They're in dire need of phylacteries, a lodging for their souls. You and the newly un-dead take to the nearest island, in the search of a phylactery to sustain them. 

PLEASE NOTE: This is a demo of a game we are developing further. It is not the full story but we still welcome comments and critiques. Have fun!
